caption.p: Effect of marjoram essential oil (EO), chitosan and ascorbic acid (AA) on fresh-cut lettuce ( A) total phenolics (g kg −1 GAE), ( B) ascorbic acid (g kg −1), ( C) antioxidant activity (DPPH; g kg −1 trolox), ( D) antioxidant activity (ABTS; g kg −1 trolox), and ( E) carotenoids (g kg −1) content after treatment and 6 days of storage at 7 °C and 90% RH. On the columns, significant differences ( p < 0.05) among treatments are indicated by different Latin letters; ns indicates no significant differences for different days. Values represent means (±SE) of measurements made on three biological replicates per treatment.
